mapper.sql: uuid, propertyCom, buildAddress, latitude, longitude, evCode, regCode, evOrder,brand,evType,del,createBy,createAt,obj
mapper.insert: insert into ev_info ( propertyCom, buildAddress, latitude, longitude, evCode, regCode, evOrder,brand,evType,del,createBy,createAt,obj) values (#{propertyCom}, #{buildAddress}, #{latitude},#{longitude}, #{evCode}, #{regCode}, #{evOrder},#{brand},#{evType},#{del},#{createBy},#{createAt},CONVERT(#{jsonObj} using utf8mb4))
mapper.select:
select uuid, propertyCom, buildAddress, latitude, longitude, evCode, regCode, evOrder,brand,evType from ev_info
and buildAddress like CONCAT('%',#{buildAddress},'%')
and propertyCom like CONCAT('%',#{propertyCom},'%' )
and ev.evCode like CONCAT('%',#{evCode},'%' )
and regCode like CONCAT('%',#{regCode},'%' )
and regCode like CONCAT('%',#{evOrder},'%' )
and regCode like CONCAT('%',#{brand},'%' )
and regCode like CONCAT('%',#{evType},'%' )
and del = 0 limit #{pageStart} , #{pageEnd}
